title: Windows Workflow Foundation
eventShortDescription: ​Adam Cogan and Mark Liu will be introducing Windows Workflow Foundation. We will discuss some real world scenarios, go over the architecture of the framework, and talk about some common problems people may face when adopting this new technology.
